units.name: Altair
units.description: A creation turned real by her almost unlimited powers, Altair longs for the destruction of the world as revenge for its cruelty to her creator.

abilities.name: Sword Rain
abilities.description: Altair launches swords at her opponent

abilities.name: The Thirteenth movement of the Cosmos; Outline Origin
abilities.description: The holopsicon robs the enemy of their health, returning them to their origin~

abilities.name: The Fourteenth Movement of Cosmos: The Vicissitudes of Fortune
abilities.description: Altair's

units.name: Sirius
units.description: A creation brought to life to replicate Altairs power, and destroy her, sirius possesses the same reality altering abilities as Altair.

abilities.name: Lance of the cosmos: Holopsicon
abilities.description: Being a creation akin to altair, Sirius also has access to the unlimited holopsicon.

abilities.name: The sixty-sixth movement of the cosmos: Existence Change.
abilities.description: Channeling the power of the Holopsicon, sirius absorbs the target, dealing heavy dammage.

abilities.name: Heavy Bunker Hit

abilities.name: EXCALIBUR
abilities.description: The King of Knights unsheathes her holy sword and brings forth the fabled noble phantasm; Excalibur!

units.name: Magane Chikujoin
units.description: A serial killer from the manga she comes from, Magane enjoys the finer things in life; murder, manipulation, and watching people tear themselves apart!

abilities.name: Hangakuu!
abilities.description: A stolen curse from history, hangaku is a fierce and loyal spirit.

abilities.name: The Infinite Desception of Words
abilities.description: Uso no Uso, Sore wa Kururi to, Uragaeru~

abilities.name: A.T Compress sequence

abilities.name: Conquest
abilities.description: The nature of an emporer, the will to topple!

units.name: Sebastion Michaelis
units.description: Simply one hell of a butler.

abilities.description: Sebation launches an array of silverware at the oponnent with deadly accuracy, ouch.

abilities.name: Game of darkness
abilities.description: In a game with a demon, the outcome is inevitable.

units.description: A sentient, artificial life form made to protect humanity against the onslaught of evil beings.

abilities.name: Single sword strike

abilities.name: Sweeping sword slash

abilities.name: Pod Laser Beam

abilities.description: Claws hard as steel slash at the oponnent.

abilities.name: Blood Demon Art; Exploading Blood

abilities.name: Warrior form!
abilities.description: Albedo uses her Warrior Form to deliver a massive string of blows

units.name: Ainz Ooal Gown
units.description: Former leader of the guild whos name he assumed, his unimaginable magical power threatens to bring the world he finds himself under his heel.

abilities.name: Grasp Heart
abilities.description: A powerful spell that crushes the heart of weaker beings, less affective against stronger oponnents.

abilities.name: Touch of Underneath

abilities.name: Super Tier Magic, Fallen Down!
abilities.description: A massively powerful spell, leaving everything in its way wrought to ash.

abilities.name: Draconic Beat-Down

abilities.name: Spinning ariel strike

abilities.name: Recurring blade sweep

abilities.name: Finishing Neck Gash!
abilities.description: A finishing move if there ever was one, this slash takes out the weak spot of the enemy with frigthening precision.

units.name: Lupisregina Beta
units.description: One of the maids of the guild Ains Ooal Gown, known as the pleiades. Her physical strenth is top tier, and her sadistic personality makes her all the more deadly.

abilities.name: Hell's Rain

abilities.name: Roar, Crosier!

abilities.name: The Drill that will Pierce the Heavens!

units.description: A prince of the great Britanian empire, he controls geass, the power to compell anyone to obey his commands. The mark of a king.

abilities.description: A simple yet effective shot from a stolen gun

abilities.name: Fire, Gawain!
abilities.description: The stolen mech barrels negative energy cannons at the oponnent, dealing devastating dammage.

abilities.name: Sleeping Drug
abilities.description: A simple yet effective drug to leave the enemy to your whims~

abilities.name: Stiletto Stab

units.name: Homura Akemi
units.description: A cold, distant and strong magical girl. Her one wish is to be able to save the one she loves.

abilities.name: Gun shots from days past
abilities.description: A stolen gun kept from time in her shield, shot at the oponnent.

abilities.name: Time stop
abilities.description: Homura uses her shield to halt time and deal 2 devastating blows.

abilities.name: Time reverse; One selfish wish
abilities.description: Homura reverses time, replaying the month leading up to this fight in a way that loses the oponnent massive amounts of hp!.

abilities.name: Narehate whack!
abilities.description: Furry Whack!

abilities.name: Soul Resonance; Sanzu Death Cannon!
abilities.description: Kids ultimate attack, a double barrel blast of power capable of rendering the strongest of souls to nothing.

abilities.name: Sword bash
abilities.description: Sayaka swings her sword down on the enemy!

abilities.name: No pain, endless barrage
abilities.description: Without a sense of pain, sayaka attacks without restraint.

abilities.name: Pumpum Pumpkin: Halloween Cannon!
abilities.description: A massive blast of pumpkin power!

abilities.name: Air Cannon

abilities.name: The Ultimate Combination
abilities.description: Air cannon, springlike limbs, kinetic booster x3, strength enhancer x4, airwalk, spearlike bones, impact nullification, and hypertrophy.

abilities.name: THE WORLD! TIME STOP!

abilities.name: MUDA MUDA MUDA MUDA MUDA!

abilities.name: Eiha

units.description: Blank never loses.

abilities.description: An amazing valentines day cake surprise, just for you~!

units.name: Chris Yukine
units.description: Chris is hot blooded and very aggressive in combat and will stop at nothing to demolish her enemies.

abilities.description: Chris Yukine shoots a barrage of bolts down on her enemy.

units.name: Satsuki Kiryuin
units.description: The daughter of the maniacal Ragyo, Satsuki believes in absolute resolve and strength of will!

abilities.name: Bakuzan
abilities.description: A killer sword capable of cutting the most sturdy of fibers, only made deadlier in the hands of the highly skilled satsuki.

abilities.description: A powerful Kamui made from life fibers, by allowing her body to draw strength from it Satsuki increases her speed and power tenfold!

abilities.name: Artilary Strike

abilities.name: Holy Targetting- Type 95

abilities.name: Gospel Holy Bullet

abilities.description: Ichigo and Zangetsu share a unique bond, which they wont hesitate to exploit for some serious damage.

abilities.name: Mae~ Sode no Shirayuki

units.name: Guts
units.description: The Black Swordsman

abilities.description: Gut's Mechanical arm comes equipped with a rickets cannon, helpful in closing the distance.

abilities.name: Berserk
abilities.description: Gut's Armor is his last resort, it grants incredible boost to power and savagery, however it can bring its user past the brink of death.

units.name: Zeref Dragneel

abilities.name: Dark Blast Inferno

abilities.name: Repent
abilities.description: A sudden, powerful vertical burst of black magic.

abilities.name: Shield Prison
abilities.description: The legendary shield is able to absorb and trap enemies, rendering them useless.

abilities.name: Legendary Shield: Wrath
abilities.description: A shield born from the anger and hatred of its user, it grants incredible offensive power but corrupts the weilder's mind in the process.

units.name: Kaede Honjou

units.series: BOFURI: I Dont Want to Get Hurt so ill Max Out My Defense!

abilities.description: Maple bashes her opponent with her shield!

abilities.name: Great Eruption

abilities.description: All of the demon moon company come equipped with pills which temporarily boost their power, in exchange for lowering life.

abilities.name: Seraph: King of Salt
abilities.description: Yuichiro adopts the power of the angel's horn within his heart, allowing for a powerful seraph known as the king of salt to emerge.

units.name: Mikaela Hyakuya
units.description: An orphan of the hyakuya sect that was unable to escape the vampire's clutches, where he became one himself.

abilities.name: Vampiric Pummel
abilities.description: As a vampire turned via a high ranking progenitor Mika possesses strength to match noble born vampires.

abilities.name: Sword Stance: Blood reign
abilities.description: Like noble vampires, mika weilds a sword capable of drinking his blood to gain power.

abilities.name: Crimson blade sweep
abilities.description: The fully charged sword is able to sweep out blades of blood.
